features.notes: First press will turns OFF the regen. A second will return it to default
First press will set the regen on 100%. A second will return it to default
First press will set the regen on 25%. A second will return it to default
First press will set the regen on 50%. A second will return it to default
First press will set the regen on 75%. A second will return it to default

features.name: Autopilot ON
features.notes: Requires Gen 2 and Front Installation. Displays the Tesla 'nag' reminder as a blinking alert in the dashboard.

features.notes: Disables Autopilot on speeds above 140km/h 85mp/h. Requires Gen2 Commander for Model S/X
